Name: Get App
Description: Returns an app by its code name if it is associated with the token's directory

Name: Update App
Description: Updates an app by the code name specified in the path

Name: Assign App
Description: Assign an application to business or directory so that it can be viewed in the App Market

Name: Install App
Description: Installs an app for the business whose token was used for authorization

Name: Unassign App
Description: Unassign an application from business or directory

Name: Uninstall App
Description: Uninstalls an app for the business whose token was used for authorization

Description: Get a list of app assignments with optional filtering

Name: Create App Assignment
Description: Create a new app assignment to a business package or directory

Description: Create a new compact JWS token that can be used to authenticate a staff member to an app in inTandem using a JWKS process

Name: Bulk create compact JWS tokens
Description: Create multiple compact JWS tokens for a list of app code names
